channel.title: A new application can't connect to network
channel.description: I installed a new application in whonix workstation, but it couldn't connect to network. Should I change proxy settings to 10.152.152.10 9101 ?

item.title: A new application can't connect to network
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Ayony

Generally speaking, new applications that are installed should connect over Tor without changing proxy setting.

Whonix

Install Software

Installing additional Software on Whonix. Safety considerations.

Read full topic
item.source: A new application can't connect to network

item.title: A new application can't connect to network
item.dc:creator: Ayony
item.description:
What about other application that I will install? It will connect over Tor or I need to change proxy settings ?

Read full topic
item.source: A new application can't connect to network

item.title: A new application can't connect to network
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Ayony

Short answer: You are not likely to connect with Telegram over Tor

Amazon and Google have pulled the plug on Domain Fronting which is used by pluggable transports such as meek, meek_lite... and software such as Telegram and Signal. The only company to currently provide domain fronting is Microsoft ( Azure cloud) is on its way to being shutdown as well, if it hasn’t already.

https://blog.torproject.org/domain-fronting-critical-open-web

Telegram over Tor is insecure so you should find an alternate messaging app.

Whonix

Chat

Anonymous Chat, IRC, XMPP. Tor Messenger/RicochetIM in Whonix without Tor over Tor.

Related:

https://forums.whonix.org/t/domain-fronting-is-slowly-disappearing/5162

Read full topic
item.source: A new application can't connect to network

item.description:
Tried to install Telegram but it cannot connect to network.
All other network is working. I don’t know what more information I can provide.

Read full topic
